UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: New antimicrobial peptide kills drug-resistant pathogens without detectable resistance
Literature.Author: Lee JK, Luchian T, Park Y

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human keratinocytes HaCat:EC50=188 µM,Human erythrocytes:10% Hemolysis=>400 µM
